channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X Review: High Performance, High Price
item.description: These are high-power, high-performance handhelds—but steep pricing and a cluttered UI hold Xbox's first portables back from greatness.

item.title: You can now text Spotify’s AI DJ
item.description: Spotify's AI DJ now takes text commands and accepts Spanish-language music requests by voice.

item.title: VSCO gets AI editing chops, support for RAW files

item.title: 4 Best Resume Builders (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Ditch the old Word doc that's hanging on by a thread. A proper resume builder can help you stand out from the crowd.

item.title: Waymo plans to launch a robotaxi service in London in 2026
